name: AnimalYoga
0:
”Alexa, play Animal Yoga”
”Alexa, ask Animal Yoga to play random”
”Alexa, ask Animal Yoga to play Octopus”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal yoga
des:
Animal Yoga provides kids a fun yoga experience and helps them develop emotional self-regulation skill through imaginative play, breathing, stretching, and healthy movement. It encourages their creativity and imagination, builds their strength and flexibility, increases their body awareness, balance, and coordination, and provides them with emotional regulation tools.


NOW WITH OVER 30 FUN ANIMAL YOGA POSES!!!

Angelfish, Armadillo, Bat, Bee, Butterfly, Cat, Chameleon, Clam, Crocodile, Dragon, Eagle, Elephant, Flamingo, Frog, Giraffe, Jellyfish, Kangaroo, Lion, Lizard, Octopus, Owl, Pufferfish, Roly Poly, Seahorse, Sea Star, Shark, Snail, Snake, Spider, Turtle, Wolf…and more to come!


HOW TO USE:

- Quick ways to get started -

Say "Alexa, play Animal Yoga" and Alexa will greet you and ask you what animal you would like to play. To have Alexa pick a random animal for you, say "Play Random". To get a list of animals, say "List Animals".

Say "Alexa, ask Animal Yoga to play Bee" or another animal of choice.

Say "Alexa, ask Animal Yoga to play random"

Say "Alexa, ask Animal Yoga for a list". Alexa will speak a list of animals you can play.


- Navigate through different animals when an animal is playing -

Say "Alexa Next" or Alexa Previous" to play the next or previous animal. 

Say "Alexa, Random" to have Alexa pick an animal for you.

Say "Alexa, Seahorse" or another animal of choice.


Clear the space, practice barefoot, and unleash your child’s body and mind! Try to do it as a family and have fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
